issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement COUNT aggregate expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6657](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6657). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement COUNT aggregate expressions. See the SUM implementation for inspiration.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6657?focusedCommentId=16937766) by Davis Silverman (sinistersnare):*
Hi, I would be interested in completing this. I have it almost implemented, need to do null checking on the value at each row. Is the submit/review process documented anywhere? Thanks!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6657?focusedCommentId=16937775) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I'm actually not sure if it is documented or not ... but basically all you need to do is create a PR from your fork and use a title like "ARROW-6657: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement COUNT in physical query plan" and add the labels "lang-rust" and "datafusion".

You can request reviews too from the Rust committers ... for the DataFusion crate that is mostly me, Paddy Horan and nevi-me right now.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6657?focusedCommentId=16944547) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5513
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5513>
